What are the treatments for Dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"How might dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase deficiency be treated in infants and children? Currently, no treatment or cure exists for the inborn error of metabolism form of DHD deficiency. Symptoms usually remain the sa
